Parameters.Name: pLogOutput
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Write parameters and action summary to server message log (Boolean True = 1)

Parameters.Name: pStrictErrorHandling
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: On encountering any error, exit with major error status by ProcessQuit after writing to the server message log (Boolean True = 1)

Parameters.Name: pDim
Parameters.Prompt: REQUIRED: Dimension, accepts wildcards (if = *, then all the dimensions)

Parameters.Name: pHier
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Hierarchy, accepts wildcards (all hierarchies except default and Leaves deleted if = *)

Parameters.Name: pTgtSubLeaves
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Name of target subset to store orphans in Leaves hierarchy

Parameters.Name: pIncludeNoParentElems
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Include elements that have no parent in any of matching hierarchies

Parameters.Name: pTgtSubNoParents
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Name of target subset to store elements that have no parent in any of matching hierarchies

Parameters.Name: pDelim
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Delimiter character (default value if blank = '&')
